about_the_game:
Insomnia: Theater in the Head Soundtrack, including 14 lossless music in Wav format.

The soundtrack was co-produced by Perfect Day Studios and Elecrystal Studio.

If you like this game, you may give us more support by purchasing the soundtrack album, which contains the music we produced for this game. We hope you like it. Thanks very much for your love and support!
